entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We should have a snippet that inserts all required-to-be-initialized fields #61550
  • When copying and pasting C# code that contains errors, the auto-formatter kicks in and makes the code look bad #61545
  • VS 2019 compiler issue following use of Quick action feature #61544
  • C# override autocomplete should not use expression body syntax #61543
  • Position of new class method which is created outside of the class via VS-proposals seems to be arbitrary #61542
  • Raw string literal interpolation close character completion should work #61541
  • Test `SourceGeneration.SyntaxAwareGeneratorTests.Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing` is flaky #61540
  • Move to namespace refactoring doesn't work with file-scoped namespace #61539
  • NRE in `VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider` #61538
  • IDE should show modifiers in quick info #61536
  • IDE should highlight required members when in an initializer #61534
  • Enhanced `#line` directives should be supported independent of language version #61530
  • False negative error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61528
  • False positive error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61527
  • Delegates with nint types in the signature don't get NativeIntegerAttributes anymore #61525
  • Public APIs for opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61523
    17.3

Closed

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for nested `fixed`/`using` statements without blocks #61518
  • Decompilation navigation box is not cancellable #28274
    Backlog
  • Null Reference while accessing GlobalOptionService #61473
  • Breaking change in overload resolution around string literals #60612
    17.3
  • "..."u8 doesn't work in attributes #60626
    17.3
  • Extremely high OOP memory usage #61314
  • Improve CPSProject_IWorkspaceProjectContext.cs #29281
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Final prototype comments and top level statements local adjustments #61551
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61549
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the project layout #61547
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't throw in logging when the document path contains curly braces (#61524) #61535
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Change natural type of UTF-8 string literals to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` and null terminate the underlying blob. #61532
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Implements support for adding and removing await/yield return in C# - IDE #61521
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test, Next
  • Merge main into features/semantic-snippets #61546
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Prepare VB iterators for EnC support #61488
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Expose VirtualChars to asp.net (through EA) to facilitate route classification #61529
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'Encapsulte Field' to use the new background work indicator. #61531
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update versions to use most recent LanguageServer changes. #61496
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve normalization to match idiomatic patterns for nested usings and fixed statements. #61533
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify error handling and notifications in rename. #61515
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't throw in logging when the document path contains curly braces #61524
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix AbstractLanguageService constructor #61513
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Utf8StringLiteral conversion #61481
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • Extract checking for generic constraint context to extension method #61485
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial documentation for the TestAccessor Pattern #28967
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix setup authoring bug #61508
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add embedded classification for field initializers #61522
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unify the final state management processing in inline-rename. #61512
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement AsyncLazyInitializer #31060
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename methods with conditional success to Try* pattern #27915
    Area-IDE
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed, PR For Personal Review Only
